attributes.action: Change how many DT subjects students can do for GCSE, A-Level, or BTEC
attributes.additional_details: I want the government or parliament to do it because I think students should be allowed to do as many DT subjects as they want for GCSE, A-Level, and BTEC. Even if that means some schools that make students do PRS for GCSE say they don’t have to anymore. I just think it gives students an opportunity to learn more and develop essential skills, especially in the case of food, that will help them in later life.
attributes.background: I want the government or parliament to change how many DT subjects students are allowed to do for GCSE, A-Level, or BTEC. For example,  if a student wants to do both food preparation and nutrition and hospitality and catering, even though they are very similar, they can.

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual schools and colleges.
